ygData.subject: RE: Selo's and SOW experiment and a bit on Koalindl Fis h
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, strangly enough, I use it when guild nobles get together or something.  More for looks than anything else.  Also, when taking a lovely elf fishing, I
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, strangly enough, I use it when guild nobles get
together or something. More for looks than anything
else. Also, when taking a lovely elf fishing, I walk
with her, not run from her :). Except one thing
bothers me, that I shake my ass, what's up with that?

Of course, I also pixie strike myself while holding
the side arrow down so I spin really fast when I get
stunned.

Way to much time on my hands,
Llewrend Lynnhaven
